faqs.question: What is PacificBlue's baggage allowance?
faqs.answer: Economy class: 1 carry-on (7kg) + 1 personal item. Business class: 2 carry-ons (14kg total) + 1 personal item. Checked baggage starts at 23kg for economy.

faqs.question: How can I change my flight?
faqs.answer: You can change flights online up to 24 hours before departure through our website or mobile app. Fees may apply depending on fare type.

faqs.question: What is your check-in policy?
faqs.answer: Online check-in opens 24 hours before flight and closes 2 hours before departure. Airport check-in closes 45 minutes before departure.

faqs.question: Do you offer refunds for cancelled flights?
faqs.answer: Full refunds for cancellations by PacificBlue. For passenger cancellations, refunds depend on fare type. Flexible fares are fully refundable.

faqs.question: What amenities are included?
faqs.answer: All flights include complimentary snacks and non-alcoholic drinks. International flights include meals, entertainment, and blanket kits.
